author: denizsun
body:
#### PR description:

- We have added useful figures to the DQM for data certification. Detailed information can be found in the corresponding [GitLab issue#258](https://gitlab.cern.ch/cmshcal/docs/-/issues/258)
- The plots are shown in the [slides](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1532808/contributions/6500798/attachments/3060049/5410904/HCAL_DQM_CMSWeek_08042025_.pdf).
- In recent global runs with stable beams, the DQM summary plot for the DigiTask consistently showed FEDs 1118 and 1121 in yellow. This issue has now been resolved. More details are available in [issue #275](https://gitlab.cern.ch/cmshcal/docs/-/issues/275).

#### PR Validation:
- runTheMatrix test has been completed.

#### Backport:
- This is not a backport PR.
title: [HCAL-DQM] Add Certification-Related DQM Plots and Fix FED 1118/1121 Yellow Status in DigiTask
